contest-event.event-date: May 2, 1981 D Midlands Area (Youth Section) Midlands Area (Youth Section) 50 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-youth-section National Youth Brass Band Championships From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results.
